sentences.en: Hot climate and plentiful rainfall favour the growth of plants.
sentences.cn: 炎热的气候和充足的雨水有助于植物生长.

sentences.en: Rainfall had dislodged debris from the slopes of the volcano.
sentences.cn: 雨水冲走了火山坡面上的岩屑。

sentences.en: Rainfall has been above normal this July.
sentences.cn: 今年7月份降雨量高于正常.

sentences.en: Rainfall has been fairly well - distributed this year.
Rainfall is abundant in the region.
Rainfall is plentiful in the area.
The amount of rainfall determines the quality of the crop.
sentences.cn: 降雨量决定着收成的好坏.

sentences.en: The annual rainfall in this area was less than 50 mm last year.
sentences.cn: 本地区去年的降雨量不足50毫米.

sentences.en: The city has received only half its average rainfall of four inches.
sentences.cn: 该市目前的降雨只有往常四英寸平均雨量的一半。

sentences.en: The rainfall average s 800 mm . a year.
sentences.cn: 平均每年降雨量为800毫米.

sentences.en: The rainfall averages 1000 mm a year.
The unusually heavy rainfall was an ill omen for the travellers.
sentences.cn: 异乎寻常的大雨是旅行者的不祥之兆.

sentences.en: There has been below average rainfall this month.
sentences.cn: 这个月的降雨低于平均降雨量。

sentences.en: There have been four years of below average rainfall.
sentences.cn: 已经有4年降雨量低于平均值了。

sentences.en: Victoria Falls has had above average levels of rainfall this year.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚瀑布今年的降雨量超过了平均水平。

sentences.en: We’ve had a long period of low rainfall.
sentences.cn: 我们已有很长一段时间雨量偏低。

words.tran_cn: 求雨；[气象] 人工降雨；翻云覆雨；使受委托人得到政治好处

phrases.tran_cn: 季风降雨；季风降水；季风雨量
降雨持续时间，降雨历时
降雨强度；降水强度；暴雨强度

trans.tran_en: the amount of rain that falls on an area in a particular period of time
